basics.label: Production Assistant Intern
basics.summary: Energetic and dedicated film student currently completing degree in media management and production. Strong interests in creative development, character writing and acting.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assist casting directors, producers and actors with audition process. Organize schedules, video and audio files. Handle cameras and various production equipment. Assisting with setup for printer and profiling. Assist with locked computer account.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Social Media Relations Intern/ Teacher Assistant
work.summary: Collect and retrieve Data. Research and aggregate content for Media Literacy Week event. Social Media Community Engager. Manage Press Release and social media post schedules. Social media creative distributor. Teacher assistant to professor at CSUN in mass communications research. Maintain blog tracking and social media calendars. Software troubleshooting (Outlook, Email support). Hardware troubleshooting (Printers, Desktop units, Laptop units, cell phones and tablets). Calling business clients (Schedule meetings, document information, data collection).

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provide self defense training to students of various ages ranging from K-12 to adults. Answer incoming and outgoing phone calls. Provide customer support. Attend weekly marketing and business instructor meetings. Attend and assist with community marketing events.

courses: Coursework in Pre and Post production
